customer_reviews.title: I first received a small tube of this shampoo and ...

customer_reviews.text: Like others, I used this conditioner (and the shampoo) at a Hilton Hotel. It works great, and is very light. I don't like most conditioners, because I feel like I have to wash my hair again after using them, not so with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Condition that scalp
customer_reviews.text: If you want to treat your scalp right, get this product, gentlemen. Start your grooming routine right!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It stays in place and is so easy to manage after each use
customer_reviews.text: I have really thick hair and this is the only conditioner that really works for me. It stays in place and is so easy to manage after each use. Love this product so much.
customer_reviews.author: John P Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually use conditioner, but bought it because I loved the shampoo so much. I don't use it every day, but when I do, I like that it doesn't make my hair flat & limp like most conditioners on my hair.
